channel.title: Tv on Casual Inference
channel.description: Recent content in Tv on Casual Inference

item.title: Revisiting The Office: A text analysis
item.description: I’m casually rewatching The Office as my I need something uninvolved to half-occupy my brain for 20 minutes show. Its been almost seven years since the last episode aired, but I still quote it with my closest friends and family – such was its personal and cultural significance. It’s aged like high school: I look back with fondness at the familiar jokes, but there’s also a sense that it was a time we have outgrown.
